actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to grant to civilian employees who are retired members of the uniformed services full retention preference credit in reductions in force for total length of time in active service in the Armed Forces.

summary.text: Extends to Federal civilian employees who are retired members of the uniformed services full retention preference credit in reductions in force for total length of time in active service in the Armed Forces. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 3501(a), 3502(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to grant to civilian employees who are retired members of the uniformed services full retention preference credit in reductions in force for total length of time in active service in the Armed Forces.
